___out_txt.description: Output text with invalid characters scrubbed

___in_bin.description: Scrubbed invalid input characters as bytes

___out_bin.description: Scrubbed invalid output characters as bytes

___rec.description: ID of the recording on the host

___pos.description: Message position in the recording, milliseconds

___timing.description: Distribution of this message's events in time

___in_txt.description: Input text with invalid characters scrubbed

___id.description: ID of the message within the recording

___host.description: Name of the host recording was made on
